name: StarLight (itch) (zerosugar)
description:
do ppl read the description of games before downloading them? i don't.

Starlight is a visual novel/dating sim type of game that has some aspects of a horror game in some endings.

you wake up in a locker, all your memories wiped, but that's not important. what is important is who you are going to spend time with over the next week, and work with on their art projects! (and possibly fall in love with)

 All art, dialogue, coding, and such were done by me.
